config.Allow Domestic Animals.name: Allow Domestic Animals
config.Allow wandering farm birds.name: Allow wandering farm birds
config.Allow wandering farm birds.descri: Marnie's chickens and ducks will sometimes wander outside of her barn if this setting is enabled.
config.Allow adoptable pets.name: Allow adoptable pets
config.Allow adoptable pets.description: Lets you adopt the pets that come with bachelors/bachelorettes after getting married. You adopt them at Marnie's for a small fee.
config.Adoptable pets adoption fee.name: Adoptable pets adoption fee
Choose between a cage or a pet bed as the bedding for Abigail's guineapig.
config.Edit Dusty's dog house.name: Edit Dusty's dog house
config.Edit Dusty's dog house.descriptio: Edits Dusty's box house into a proper dog house if this setting is enabled.
config.Enable spawn at day start.name: Enable spawn at day start
config.Enable spawn at day start.descrip: Allows the animals to spawn in the game immediately when the day starts instead of having them spawn only when the player enters the map they're in. This is useful for multiplayer, but may cause performance issues. Feel free to disable if it's singleplayer or struggling with longer loading/low framerates.
config.Load Animals.name: Load Animals
